publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4202 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Rule 2.7.2â€”That the Parliament agrees under Rule 2.7.2 that the Parliament shall meet in Committee Rooms 2 and 6 of the Parliament at Holyrood as recommended by the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body until 21 April 2006.
